title: PROMETHEUS AMERICANA, Epilogue: gm, Singularity
excerpt: Your relationships, your career, your diet—all are managed by a system that knows you better than you know yourself.

title: PROMETHEUS AMERICANA, part 5: The Stacks of Babel
excerpt: While America was pursuing its chaotic, capitalist-flavored techno-fascism, China had perfected a top-down AI autocracy.

title: PROMETHEUS AMERICANA, part 4: Patch Notes for the Republic
excerpt: “Citizen update. The stability of the Republic has been preserved.”

title: PROMETHEUS AMERICANA, part 3: The Third Term Glitch
excerpt: He was supposed to be the one pulling the levers. Now, he’s just a lever.

title: PROMETHEUS AMERICANA, part 2: WAGMI, If You Comply
excerpt: You are no longer employed; you are a ‘participant in the economic algorithm.’ Your very existence generates data, and data is the new oil.

title: PROMETHEUS AMERICANA, part 1: The God-Emperor's New Groove
excerpt: We’re building the biggest, most beautiful brain in the world — a red, white, and blue brain — and it’s going to take care of you.
